trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
trans-unit.target: **注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Represents a group of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> objects that is used to apply multiple effects to a visible object.
trans-unit.target: 表示一组<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref>用于将多个效果应用于可见对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: The order in which effects are added to a group affects the final visual representation of the content that the effects are applied to.
trans-unit.target: 效果添加到组中的顺序会影响最终的可视表示形式效果应用于的内容。

trans-unit.source: The effects are chained so that the visual of the first effect is used as the source of the second.
trans-unit.target: 效果被链接，以便作为第二个源使用的第一个效果的视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: This logic is followed through all subsequent effects within the effect group.
trans-unit.target: 通过该效果组内的所有后续效果均遵循此逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The following image shows the effect that a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect> have when added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示效果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect>具有时添加到一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect>

trans-unit.source: The first button has the drop shadow applied first and the outer glow applied last.
trans-unit.target: 第一个按钮具有首先应用的投影和外部发光最后应用。

trans-unit.source: In the second button, the order is reversed.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个按钮，反转顺序。

trans-unit.source: ![Affect of an effect's order in a BitmapEffectGroup](~/add/media/effectgrouporder.PNG "Affect of an effect's order in a BitmapEffectGroup") Effects in a BitmapEffectGroup
trans-unit.target: ![BitmapEffectGroup 中的效果的顺序的影响](~/add/media/effectgrouporder.PNG "BitmapEffectGroup 中的效果的顺序的影响")效果在 BitmapEffectGroup 中

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
trans-unit.target: **注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
trans-unit.target: **注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的子级<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The children of the effects group as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 效果的子级组作为<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
trans-unit.target: **注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children%2A>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
